name: Crow Forest: New World
description:
Crow Forest : New World;


“Crow Forest : New World” is a new survival game. Explore the world. Create your own weapons and tools. Build your own house and protect yourself from the dangers that could happen.


“Crow Forest : New World” will always be updating by us. We are gonna renew it periodically every month. Our game is designed from a third-person perspective. You can play the game as you wish, both single-player and multiplayer. The beta version will not be released, it will be made available directly to the early access. New World contains human needs such as hunger and thirst. With open world experience; provides an opportunity to reach just as food and beverage in the forest.
